mapper.select: SELECT review_no , content_id , review_text , review_writer , reg_date , update_date , rating FROM disney_review WHERE content_id = #{contentId} and review_writer NOT IN(#{userName}) ORDER BY review_no DESC
SELECT review_no , content_id , review_text , review_writer , reg_date , update_date , rating FROM disney_review WHERE content_id = #{contentId} and review_writer = #{userName}

SELECT review_no , content_id , review_text , review_writer , reg_date , update_date , rating , user_img FROM disney_review INNER JOIN user ON user_name = review_writer WHERE content_id = #{contentId} ORDER BY review_no DESC LIMIT #{criteria.pageStart}, #{criteria.perPageNum}
